    <script charset="UTF-8" defer>
        // JavaScript :>

        let button = document.querySelector('input#dark-light');
        let body = document.querySelector('body#principal');

        function MudarTema() {
            button.style.background = 'grey';
            body.style.background = 'white';
            body.style.color = 'black;';
        }
    </script>
</body>
